mapper.insert: INSERT INTO category (categoryno, name, subname, seq, cnt, parentno) SELECT CATEGORY_SEQ.nextval AS categoryno, #{name} AS name, CASE WHEN EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM CATEGORY WHERE name = #{name}) THEN #{subname} ELSE '-' END AS subname, CASE WHEN EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM CATEGORY WHERE name = #{name}) THEN (SELECT MAX(seq) + 1 FROM CATEGORY WHERE name = #{name}) ELSE (SELECT COALESCE(CEIL(MAX(seq) / 10 + 0.5) * 10 + 1, 1) FROM CATEGORY) END AS seq, 100 AS cnt, CASE WHEN EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM CATEGORY WHERE name = #{name}) THEN (SELECT categoryno FROM CATEGORY WHERE name = #{name} AND subname = '-') ELSE NULL END AS parentno FROM dual
mapper.select: SELECT categoryno, name, subname, seq, cnt, parentno FROM category WHERE subname != '-' ORDER BY seq ASC
SELECT categoryno, name FROM category WHERE name IN ( SELECT DISTINCT name FROM category ) AND subname = '-' ORDER BY seq ASC
SELECT categoryno, name, subname FROM category WHERE name = #{name} AND subname != '-' ORDER BY seq ASC

SELECT categoryno, name, subname, seq, cnt, parentno FROM category
WHERE UPPER(name) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{word}) || '%' OR UPPER(subname) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{word}) || '%'
ORDER BY seq ASC

SELECT COUNT(*) as cnt FROM category
WHERE UPPER(name) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{word}) || '%' OR UPPER(subname) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{word}) || '%'
ORDER BY seq ASC
